title: Ciranda Cafe Cultura y Artes
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Beer/Wine, Fusion, Brazilian, South American, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. In the party town of Rio Vermelho on the road to the Ibis and Mercure hotels, a most unlikely thing in Brazil's north east: a restaurant and bar that marks items not just vegetarian but vegan, too (a rarity). Many appetizers and main courses for vegetarians, and several for vegans.
